actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to make its provisions applicable to certain additional territories of the United States.

summary.text: Makes the provisions of the National Labor Relations Act applicable to the following additional territories of the United States: American Samoa, Wake Island, and specified Outer Continental Shelf lands. (Adds 29 U.S.C. 152(14),(15))

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to make its provisions applicable to certain additional territories of the United States.
